scripts.say: Ah... This power... extraordinary... Incredible that you've found this strengthâ€¦
We've been found out. Eugen, it's time to retreat.
Oh? We've got the upper hand! Why would we turn back now?
Our secret weapon has been discovered. Dragging this out will only expose us further. Follow my orders and retreat immediately!
Damn... So there's no helping it.... Take care, little sheep. We'll be seeing you again.
... Why... why would you betray our alliance...
Honor and loyalty... Only with great power can we truly save humanity. We've... we've just chosen a different path.
I don't expect you to understand. Only those looking back on these moments will be able to decide who is right and who is wrong.
My old friend... May we meet in Valhalla...
... Humanity is such an interesting lifeform... The power we gave them was just the beginning... History has already begun to be rewritten...
Let's continue our observations for some time... I have great expectations for their future developments...
If we didn't take these steps, coming back to this era would have been meaningless, no? Ahaha...

sequence: The world order is crumbling... Those with power must stand up and fight against the currents of evil and the torrents of history.
It is known, however, that power begets power, bringing forth even stronger waves...
